title: Take a Bow Lore Team
body: The past couple of seasons have been an absolute trainwreck in a lot of areas from balance to player-Riot communication. It's been keeping me from playing for pretty much 2 solid years, coming back every now and then when i feel like a good game of league. But the one thing that has been keeping a constantly high level of quality for the past couple of years is the lore. There was a time when everyone was hard on the lore team for lack of content, but it was well worth the wait because since that point every release by them has been engaging and of the highest quality in both writing and detail. Now all we need is a map and I can die happy. So I sincerely hope you guys are over there giving yourselves pats on the back and thank you for all your hard work.

No, no - please don't die.  We need you.

ignore him.. I need champ connections.. I remember season 6 my buddy played ashe and lissandra was on the other team it was an extra mission for her to ult lissandra.. y idk but it was cool the frejlord beef and whatnot.. jus sayin interactive in game missions would be cool.. stuff like ornn vs voli or ren vs nasus.. do u guys even think of that.. ur the creators.. create.. screw the rune changes.. great middle finger to the time spent craftin my pages to my play style.. at least give me more stories of ekko and his runnins with vi and cait through his misadventures in zaun.. stuff like that.. give their connections meaning if u kno what I mean..

Yes..... what he said!

Riot please. I agree. I loved this game, I used to play 4+ hours a day, 7 days a week. Now im older and i have a life and a family, and i still play as much as i can. i've spent hundreds of dollars on riot points and thousands of hours on multiple accounts. You have made some Intense changes recently. But The Lore is dead. Nobody cares for it anymore. i WANT to care, but I cant. 1 The current lore makes no sense, and 2, the individual champion stories dont fit with the basic Runeterra Lore. Please take some time. People want stories, the Bloodline story, and the story about Zaun and the New Varus. Those are so cool! But mix everything together and it doesnt fit like a puzzle. 
I would be willing to come up with design ideas or stories of my own, but not unless anyone would care.

> I would be willing to come up with design ideas or stories of my own, but not unless anyone would care.

You know, the problem with everything fitting together is a matter of "who actually relates to who."

Like, what link does Ashe have with, say...Warwick?

Their stories will be completely incompatible for the simple reason of "why would they meet."

Both of their stories are so separated due to individual locations and lives going on.  While some factions have interactions with others, you can't expect everyone to know everyone.

Sure, everyone can now be aware of Prez Trump, but PT won't be aware of everyone, nor would everyone meet him in real life.  He is background information that could do very little for a person's background. Especially if said person is 1 of 3 billion in China.  Sure, everyone enjoys a good crossover (hell, MF, Lucian, and Olaf all appeared in the same story, like WTF), but not every crossover makes sense unless proper happenstances occur for it to work.  MF and Lucy only worked because they both have a revenge story going on (so they get to mull things over on that), and Lucy came to Bilgewater for Thresh during the Harrowing.  He has a proper reason to appear regardless of who anybody else is.

Olaf...was pure random.

We also need stories that branch from the Main lore(that needs to be fixed) about the lands themselves. New stories like the Varus has so much character and interest. They have families and bonds. Noxans come to invade them and so forth. That story makes sense. Im just asking Riot to spend more time fixing the old champion 'stories'. Thanks for your input.

Aw! Okay, I see.  Here's the thing: the "League" does not exist.

The Institute of War does not exist

The game you play on the rift is not canon

This was Retconned in 2014.

All this new lore we are getting is BECAUSE the IOW no longer exists.  I believe the main story you are referring to no longer exists as for as post retcon is concerned.  With that being said, I am still waitin for some more champion interactions in lore to occur.

The last time we had some good lore with them interacting with each other I think was Bloodline. I could be wrong though, but I believe that was the only solid one unless you want to count color stories.

Thats what I fear, is that Riot doesnt CARE to make any League or Institute of War, they mentioned it years ago. I absolutely agree with what you said there should be some champ interactions. 
 My MAIN question is... Where does the rift come from? Where is it located? what gives it the magic properties so you can die over and over again?
the League of Legends = Leagues of players(bronze-challenger/pro) summoning champions for fun just to fight. Whats the point of the fighting? Why are certain people in the rift and some not? 

The new Varus story is awesome. But how does that make him a chosen 'champion' for the rift? 
We need questions answered!!!

What about the new lore doesn't make sense?

And everything not fitting together may be in part due to the fact half the characters still have their old, bare-bones, kind of generic lore, and haven't been updated to fit into the new narrative.
